amendment.description: An amendment numbered 83 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to prevent funds from being used to mandate electronic identification eartags for cattle and bison.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prevent funds from being used to mandate electronic identification eartags for cattle and bison.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 336 (Roll no. 419).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A034) offered by Ms. Hageman.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 97 - 336 (Roll no. 419).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
